column4: Well now I see fine I'll keep 10:10 for now and I guess I'll find a working distribution most likely mint fror an upgrade
I am shocked how bad 11:10 is but I get kicked in the teeth twice Iknow to go.
I want to wish everyone a good night;I'll tell all the people I converted to Ubuntu not to upgrade to 11:10 save them the time and pain.
It just depends on their hardware. ;)
